member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ActivePoseHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ActivePoseHelper.UseGravityCompensation
member.summary: Sets the UseGravityCompensation setting for this . Apply gravity compensation as well?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ActivePoseHelper.AnimSource
member.summary: Sets the AnimSource setting for this .

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ApplyImpulseHelper for sending a ApplyImpulse to a given .
member.param: The to send the ApplyImpulse to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.EqualizeAmount
member.summary: Sets the EqualizeAmount setting for this . 0 means straight impulse, 1 means multiply by the mass (change in velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Sets the PartIndex setting for this . index of part being hit. -1 apply impulse to COM.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = -1. Max value = 28.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.Impulse
member.summary: Sets the Impulse setting for this . impulse vector (impulse is change in momentum).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -4500.0f. Max value = 4500.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Sets the HitPoint setting for this . optional point on part where hit. If not supplied then the impulse is applied at the part centre.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalHitPointInfo setting for this . hitPoint in local coordinates of bodyPart.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalImpulseInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalImpulseInfo setting for this . impulse in local coordinates of bodyPart.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.AngularImpulse
member.summary: Sets the AngularImpulse setting for this . impulse should be considered an angular impulse.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ApplyBulletImpulseHelper for sending a ApplyBulletImpulse to a given .
member.param: The to send the ApplyBulletImpulse to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.EqualizeAmount
member.summary: Sets the EqualizeAmount setting for this . 0 means straight impulse, 1 means multiply by the mass (change in velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Sets the PartIndex setting for this . index of part being hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 28.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.Impulse
member.summary: Sets the Impulse setting for this . impulse vector (impulse is change in momentum).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1000.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Sets the HitPoint setting for this . optional point on part where hit.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalHitPointInfo setting for this . true = hitPoint is in local coordinates of bodyPart, false = hitpoint is in world coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.ExtraShare
member.summary: Sets the ExtraShare setting for this . if not 0.0 then have an extra bullet applied to spine0 (approximates the COM). Uses setup from configureBulletsExtra. 0-1 shared 0.0 = no extra bullet, 0.5 = impulse split equally between extra and bullet, 1.0 only extra bullet. LT 0.0 then bullet + scaled extra bullet. Eg.-0.5 = bullet + 0.5 impulse extra bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper
member.summary: Set the amount of relaxation across the whole body; Used to collapse the character into a rag-doll-like state.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyRelaxHelper for sending a BodyRelax to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyRelax to.
member.remarks: Set the amount of relaxation across the whole body; Used to collapse the character into a rag-doll-like state.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Relaxation
member.summary: Sets the Relaxation setting for this . How relaxed the body becomes, in percentage relaxed. 100 being totally rag-dolled, 0 being very stiff and rigid.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.HoldPose
member.summary: Sets the HoldPose setting for this . automatically hold the current pose as the character relaxes - can be used to avoid relaxing into a t-pose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.DisableJointDriving
member.summary: Sets the DisableJointDriving setting for this . sets the drive state to free - this reduces drifting on the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper
member.summary: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behaviour that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceHelper for sending a ConfigureBalance to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalance to.
member.remarks: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behaviour that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeight
member.summary: Sets the StepHeight setting for this . maximum height that character steps vertically (above 0.2 is high...but ok for say underwater).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.4f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeightInc4Step
member.summary: Sets the StepHeightInc4Step setting for this . added to stepHeight if going up steps.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.4f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartRestep
member.summary: Sets the LegsApartRestep setting for this . if the legs end up more than (legsApartRestep + hipwidth) apart even though balanced, take another step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsTogetherRestep
member.summary: Sets the LegsTogetherRestep setting for this . mmmm0.1 for drunk if the legs end up less than (hipwidth - legsTogetherRestep) apart even though balanced, take another step. A value of 1 will turn off this feature and the max value is hipWidth = 0.23f by default but is model dependent.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartMax
member.summary: Sets the LegsApartMax setting for this . FRICTION WORKAROUND: if the legs end up more than (legsApartMax + hipwidth) apart when balanced, adjust the feet positions to slide back so they are legsApartMax + hipwidth apart. Needs to be less than legsApartRestep to see any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.TaperKneeStrength
member.summary: Sets the TaperKneeStrength setting for this . does the knee strength reduce with angle.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this . stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeftLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Sets the LeftLegSwingDamping setting for this . damping of left leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.2f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RightLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Sets the RightLegSwingDamping setting for this . damping of right leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.2f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityLegs
member.summary: Sets the OpposeGravityLegs setting for this . Gravity opposition applied to hips and knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityAnkles
member.summary: Sets the OpposeGravityAnkles setting for this . Gravity opposition applied to ankles. General balancer likes 1.0. StaggerFall likes 0.1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAcc
member.summary: Sets the LeanAcc setting for this . Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the lean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.HipLeanAcc
member.summary: Sets the HipLeanAcc setting for this . Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAccMax
member.summary: Sets the LeanAccMax setting for this . Max floorAcceleration allowed for lean and leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAcc
member.summary: Sets the ResistAcc setting for this . Level of cheat force added to character to resist the effect of floorAcceleration (anti-Acceleration) - added to upperbody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAccMax
member.summary: Sets the ResistAccMax setting for this . Max floorAcceleration allowed for anti-Acceleration. If GT 20.0 then it is probably in a crash.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootSlipCompOnMovingFloor
member.summary: Sets the FootSlipCompOnMovingFloor setting for this . This parameter will be removed when footSlipCompensation preserves the foot angle on a moving floor]. If the character detects a moving floor and footSlipCompOnMovingFloor is false then it will turn off footSlipCompensation - at footSlipCompensation preserves the global heading of the feet. If footSlipCompensation is off then the character usually turns to the side in the end although when turning the vehicle turns it looks promising for a while.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AnkleEquilibrium
member.summary: Sets the AnkleEquilibrium setting for this . ankle equilibrium angle used when static balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraFeetApart
member.summary: Sets the ExtraFeetApart setting for this . additional feet apart setting.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DontStepTime
member.summary: Sets the DontStepTime setting for this . amount of time at the start of a balance before the character is allowed to start stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: Sets the BalanceAbortThreshold setting for this . when the character gives up and goes into a fall. Larger values mean that the balancer can lean more before failing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeight
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpHeight setting for this . height between lowest foot and COM below which balancer will give up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScale
member.summary: Sets the StepClampScale setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScaleVariance
member.summary: Sets the StepClampScaleVariance setting for this . Variance in clamp scale every step. if negative only takes away from clampScale.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeHip
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTimeHip setting for this . amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to move hip to (kind of). Will be controlled by balancer in future but can help recover spine quicker from bending forwards to much.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTime
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTime setting for this . amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to step to. bigger values try to recover with fewer, bigger steps. smaller values recover with smaller steps, and generally recover less.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeVariance
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTimeVariance setting for this . Variance in predictionTime every step. if negative only takes away from predictionTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxSteps
member.summary: Sets the MaxSteps setting for this . Maximum number of steps that the balancer will take.
member.remarks: Default value = 100. Min value = 1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxBalanceTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxBalanceTime setting for this . Maximum time(seconds) that the balancer will balance for.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraSteps
member.summary: Sets the ExtraSteps setting for this . Allow the balancer to take this many more steps before hitting maxSteps. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraTime
member.summary: Sets the ExtraTime setting for this . Allow the balancer to balance for this many more seconds before hitting maxBalanceTime. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallType
member.summary: Sets the FallType setting for this . How to fall after maxSteps or maxBalanceTime.
member.remarks: Default value = . If BCR has to be active.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallMult
member.summary: Sets the FallMult setting for this . Multiply the rampDown of stiffness on falling by this amount ( GT 1 fall quicker).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallReduceGravityComp
member.summary: Sets the FallReduceGravityComp setting for this . Reduce gravity compensation as the legs weaken on falling.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RampHipPitchOnFail
member.summary: Sets the RampHipPitchOnFail setting for this . bend over when falling after maxBalanceTime.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableLinSpeedThresh
member.summary: Sets the StableLinSpeedThresh setting for this . Linear speed threshold for successful balance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableRotSpeedThresh
member.summary: Sets the StableRotSpeedThresh setting for this . Rotational speed threshold for successful balance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FailMustCollide
member.summary: Sets the FailMustCollide setting for this . The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.IgnoreFailure
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreFailure setting for this . Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ChangeStepTime
member.summary: Sets the ChangeStepTime setting for this . time not in contact (airborne) before step is changed. If -ve don't change step.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceIndefinitely
member.summary: Sets the BalanceIndefinitely setting for this . Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MovingFloor
member.summary: Sets the MovingFloor setting for this . temporary variable to ignore movingFloor code that generally causes the character to fall over if the feet probe a moving object e.g. treading on a gun.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AirborneStep
member.summary: Sets the AirborneStep setting for this . when airborne try to step. Set to false for e.g. shotGun reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.UseComDirTurnVelThresh
member.summary: Sets the UseComDirTurnVelThresh setting for this . Velocity below which the balancer turns in the direction of the COM forward instead of the ComVel - for use with shot from running with high upright constraint use 1.9.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MinKneeAngle
member.summary: Sets the MinKneeAngle setting for this . Minimum knee angle (-ve value will mean this functionality is not applied). 0.4 seems a good value.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.5f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterSwingFeet
member.summary: Sets the FlatterSwingFeet setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterStaticFeet
member.summary: Sets the FlatterStaticFeet setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidLeg
member.summary: Sets the AvoidLeg setting for this . If true then balancer tries to avoid leg2leg collisions/avoid crossing legs. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFootWidth
member.summary: Sets the AvoidFootWidth setting for this . NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. avoidFootWidth = how much inwards from the ankle this line is in (m).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFeedback
member.summary: Sets the AvoidFeedback setting for this . NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. Avoid doesn't allow the desired stepping foot to cross the line. avoidFeedback = how much of the actual crossing of that line is fedback as an error.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAgainstVelocity
member.summary: Sets the LeanAgainstVelocity setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepDecisionThreshold
member.summary: Sets the StepDecisionThreshold setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepIfInSupport
member.summary: Sets the StepIfInSupport setting for this . The balancer sometimes decides to step even if balanced.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AlwaysStepWithFarthest
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysStepWithFarthest setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StandUp
member.summary: Sets the StandUp setting for this . standup more with increased velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudge
member.summary: Sets the DepthFudge setting for this . Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when the balancer is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudgeStagger
member.summary: Sets the DepthFudgeStagger setting for this . Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when staggerFall is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudgeStagger).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFriction
member.summary: Sets the FootFriction setting for this . Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if balancer is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFrictionStagger
member.summary: Sets the FootFrictionStagger setting for this . Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if staggerFall is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BackwardsLeanCutoff
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsLeanCutoff setting for this . Backwards lean threshold to cut off stay upright forces. 0.0 Vertical - 1.0 horizontal. 0.6 is a sensible value. NB: the balancer does not fail in order to give stagger that extra step as it falls. A backwards lean of GT 0.6 will generally mean the balancer will soon fail without stayUpright forces.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeightEnd
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpHeightEnd setting for this . if this value is different from giveUpHeight, actual giveUpHeight will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThresholdEnd
member.summary: Sets the BalanceAbortThresholdEnd setting for this . if this value is different from balanceAbortThreshold, actual balanceAbortThreshold will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpRampDuration
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpRampDuration setting for this . duration of ramp from start of behaviour for above two parameters. If smaller than 0, no ramp is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanToAbort
member.summary: Sets the LeanToAbort setting for this . lean at which to send abort message when maxSteps or maxBalanceTime is reached.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper
member.summary: reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceResetHelper for sending a ConfigureBalanceReset to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalanceReset to.
member.remarks: reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper
member.summary: this single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper for sending a ConfigureSelfAvoidance to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSelfAvoidance to.
member.remarks: this single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UseSelfAvoidance
member.summary: Sets the UseSelfAvoidance setting for this . Enable or disable self avoidance tech.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteDragReduction
member.summary: Sets the OverwriteDragReduction setting for this . Specify whether self avoidance tech should use original IK input target or the target that has been already modified by getStabilisedPos() tech i.e. function that compensates for rotational and linear velocity of shoulder/thigh.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.TorsoSwingFraction
member.summary: Sets the TorsoSwingFraction setting for this . Place the adjusted target this much along the arc between effector (wrist) and target, value in range [0,1].
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.MaxTorsoSwingAngleRad
member.summary: Sets the MaxTorsoSwingAngleRad setting for this . Max value on the effector (wrist) to adjusted target offset.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.6f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidIfInSpineBoundsOnly
member.summary: Sets the SelfAvoidIfInSpineBoundsOnly setting for this . Restrict self avoidance to operate on targets that are within character torso bounds only.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidAmount
member.summary: Sets the SelfAvoidAmount setting for this . Amount of self avoidance offset applied when angle from effector (wrist) to target is greater then right angle i.e. when total offset is a blend between where effector currently is to value that is a product of total arm length and selfAvoidAmount. SelfAvoidAmount is in a range between [0, 1].
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteTwist
member.summary: Sets the OverwriteTwist setting for this . Overwrite desired IK twist with self avoidance procedural twist.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UsePolarPathAlgorithm
member.summary: Sets the UsePolarPathAlgorithm setting for this . Use the alternative self avoidance algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending. WARNING: It only requires "radius" in terms of parametrization.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.Radius
member.summary: Sets the Radius setting for this . Self avoidance radius, measured out from the spine axis along the plane perpendicular to that axis. The closer is the proximity of reaching target to that radius, the more polar (curved) motion is used for offsetting the target. WARNING: Parameter only used by the alternative algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBulletsHelper for sending a ConfigureBullets to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBullets to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpreadOverParts
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpreadOverParts setting for this . spreads impulse across parts. currently only for spine parts, not limbs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseLeakageStrengthScaled
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseLeakageStrengthScaled setting for this . for weaker characters subsequent impulses remain strong.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulsePeriod
member.summary: Sets the ImpulsePeriod setting for this . duration that impulse is spread over (triangular shaped).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseTorqueScale setting for this . An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the centre of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Sets the LoosenessFix setting for this . Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the centre of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseDelay
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseDelay setting for this . time from hit before impulses are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseReductionPerShot
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseReductionPerShot setting for this . by how much are subsequent impulses reduced (e.g. 0.0: no reduction, 0.1: 10% reduction each new hit).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseRecovery
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseRecovery setting for this . recovery rate of impulse strength per second (impulse strength from 0.0:1.0). At 60fps a impulseRecovery=60.0 will recover in 1 frame.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseMinLeakage
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseMinLeakage setting for this . the minimum amount of impulse leakage allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueMode setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = . If - proportional to character strength, can reduce impulse amount. If - no reduction of impulse and not proportional to character strength.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueSpinMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueSpinMode setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = . If a burst effect is achieved.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueFilterMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueFilterMode setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = .

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueAlwaysSpine3
member.summary: Sets the TorqueAlwaysSpine3 setting for this . always apply torques to spine3 instead of actual part hit.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueDelay
member.summary: Sets the TorqueDelay setting for this . time from hit before torques are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorquePeriod
member.summary: Sets the TorquePeriod setting for this . duration of torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueGain
member.summary: Sets the TorqueGain setting for this . multiplies impulse magnitude to arrive at torque that is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueCutoff
member.summary: Sets the TorqueCutoff setting for this . minimum ratio of impulse that remains after converting to torque (if in strength-proportional mode).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueReductionPerTick
member.summary: Sets the TorqueReductionPerTick setting for this . ratio of torque for next tick (e.g. 1.0: not reducing over time, 0.9: each tick torque is reduced by 10%).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.LiftGain
member.summary: Sets the LiftGain setting for this . amount of lift (directly multiplies torque axis to give lift force).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulseDelay
member.summary: Sets the CounterImpulseDelay setting for this . time after impulse is applied that counter impulse is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulseMag
member.summary: Sets the CounterImpulseMag setting for this . amount of the original impulse that is countered.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterAfterMagReached
member.summary: Sets the CounterAfterMagReached setting for this . applies the counter impulse counterImpulseDelay(secs) after counterImpulseMag of the Impulse has been applied.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.DoCounterImpulse
member.summary: Sets the DoCounterImpulse setting for this . add a counter impulse to the pelvis.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulse2Hips
member.summary: Sets the CounterImpulse2Hips setting for this . amount of the counter impulse applied to hips - the rest is applied to the part originally hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseNoBalMult
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseNoBalMult setting for this . amount to scale impulse by if the dynamicBalance is not OK. 1.0 means this functionality is not applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabStart
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseBalStabStart setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabEnd
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseBalStabEnd setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabMult
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseBalStabMult setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngStart
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpineAngStart setting for this . 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngEnd
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpineAngEnd setting for this . 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngMult
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpineAngMult setting for this . 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelStart
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseVelStart setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelEnd
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseVelEnd setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelMult
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseVelMult setting for this . 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMult
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseAirMult setting for this . amount to scale impulse by if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK and impulse is above impulseAirMultStart.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMultStart
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseAirMultStart setting for this . if impulse is above this value scale it by impulseAirMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMax
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseAirMax setting for this . amount to clamp impulse to if character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirApplyAbove
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseAirApplyAbove setting for this . if impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirOn
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseAirOn setting for this . scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMult

member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMultStart
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseOneLegMultStart setting for this . if impulse is above this value scale it by impulseOneLegMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMax

member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove setting for this . if impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbRatio
member.summary: Sets the RbRatio setting for this . 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbLowerShare
member.summary: Sets the RbLowerShare setting for this . rigid body response is shared between the upper and lower body (rbUpperShare = 1-rbLowerShare). rbLowerShare=0.5 gives upper and lower share scaled by mass. i.e. if 70% ub mass and 30% lower mass then rbLowerShare=0.5 gives actualrbShare of 0.7ub and 0.3lb. rbLowerShare GT 0.5 scales the ub share down from 0.7 and the lb up from 0.3.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMoment
member.summary: Sets the RbMoment setting for this . 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMaxTwistMomentArm
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxTwistMomentArm setting for this . Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMaxBroomMomentArm
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxBroomMomentArm setting for this . Maximum broom((everything but the twist) arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbPivot
member.summary: Sets the RbPivot setting for this . if false pivot around COM always, if true change pivot depending on foot contact: to feet centre if both feet in contact, or foot position if 1 foot in contact or COM position if no feet in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper for sending a ConfigureBulletsExtra to a given .

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseSpreadOverParts
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpreadOverParts setting for this . spreads impulse across parts. currently only for spine parts, not limbs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulsePeriod
member.summary: Sets the ImpulsePeriod setting for this . duration that impulse is spread over (triangular shaped).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseTorqueScale setting for this . An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the centre of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Sets the LoosenessFix setting for this . Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the centre of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: Sets the ImpulseOneLegMax setting for this . amount to clamp impulse to if character is contacting with one foot only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove setting for this . if impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegOn
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseOneLegOn setting for this . scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is contacting with one leg only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbRatio
member.summary: Sets the RbRatio setting for this . 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbLowerShare
member.summary: Sets the RbLowerShare setting for this . rigid body response is shared between the upper and lower body (rbUpperShare = 1-rbLowerShare). rbLowerShare=0.5 gives upper and lower share scaled by mass. i.e. if 70% ub mass and 30% lower mass then rbLowerShare=0.5 gives actualrbShare of 0.7ub and 0.3lb. rbLowerShare GT 0.5 scales the ub share down from 0.7 and the lb up from 0.3.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMoment
member.summary: Sets the RbMoment setting for this . 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMaxTwistMomentArm
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxTwistMomentArm setting for this . Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMaxBroomMomentArm
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxBroomMomentArm setting for this . Maximum broom((everything but the twist) arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbRatioAirborne
member.summary: Sets the RbRatioAirborne setting for this . if Airborne: 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMomentAirborne
member.summary: Sets the RbMomentAirborne setting for this . if Airborne: 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: Sets the RbMaxTwistMomentArmAirborne setting for this . if Airborne: Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

Sets the RbTwistAxis setting for this .

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbPivot
member.summary: Sets the RbPivot setting for this . if false pivot around COM always, if true change pivot depending on foot contact: to feet centre if both feet in contact, or foot position if 1 foot in contact or COM position if no feet in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper
member.summary: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureLimitsHelper for sending a ConfigureLimits to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureLimits to.
member.remarks: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value for joint limits to configure. Ignored if index != -1.
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Enable
member.summary: Sets the Enable setting for this . If false, disable (set all to PI, -PI) limits.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToDesired
member.summary: Sets the ToDesired setting for this . If true, set limits to accommodate current desired angles.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Restore
member.summary: Sets the Restore setting for this . Return to cached defaults?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToCurAnimation
member.summary: Sets the ToCurAnimation setting for this . If true, set limits to the current animated limits.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Index
member.summary: Sets the Index setting for this . Index of effector to configure. Set to -1 to use mask.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean1
member.summary: Sets the Lean1 setting for this . Custom limit values to use if not setting limits to desired. Limits are RAGE-native, not NM-wrapper-native.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean2
member.summary: Sets the Lean2 setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Twist
member.summary: Sets the Twist setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Margin
member.summary: Sets the Margin setting for this . Joint limit margin to add to current animation limits when using those to set runtime limits.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSoftLimitHelper for sending a ConfigureSoftLimit to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSoftLimit to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Index
member.summary: Sets the Index setting for this . Select limb that the soft limit is going to be applied to.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . Stiffness of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate spring term that contributes to the desired acceleration.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . Damping of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate damper term that contributes to the desired acceleration. To have the system critically dampened set it to 1.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.9f. Max value = 1.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.LimitAngle
member.summary: Sets the LimitAngle setting for this . Soft limit angle. Positive angle in RAD, measured relatively either from hard limit maxAngle (approach direction = -1) or minAngle (approach direction = 1). This angle will be clamped if outside the joint hard limit range.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.ApproachDirection
member.summary: Sets the ApproachDirection setting for this . Limit angle can be measured relatively to joints hard limit minAngle or maxAngle. Set approachDirection to +1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit minAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the elbow. Set it to -1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit maxAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the knee.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = -1. Max value = 1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.VelocityScaled
member.summary: Sets the VelocityScaled setting for this . Scale stiffness based on character angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.HipYaw
member.summary: Sets the HipYaw setting for this . Amount of hip twist. (Negative values twist into bullet direction - probably not what is wanted).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.HipRoll
member.summary: Sets the HipRoll setting for this . Amount of hip roll.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.ForceStepExtraHeight
member.summary: Sets the ForceStepExtraHeight setting for this . Additional height added to stepping foot.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.7f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.ForceStep
member.summary: Sets the ForceStep setting for this . force a step to be taken whether pushed out of balance or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.StepTurn
member.summary: Sets the StepTurn setting for this . turn the character using the balancer.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelMultiplierStart
member.summary: Sets the VelMultiplierStart setting for this . Start velocity where parameters begin to be ramped down to zero linearly.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelMultiplierEnd
member.summary: Sets the VelMultiplierEnd setting for this . End velocity of ramp where parameters are scaled to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelForceStep
member.summary: Sets the VelForceStep setting for this . Velocity above which a step is not forced.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelStepTurn
member.summary: Sets the VelStepTurn setting for this . Velocity above which a stepTurn is not asked for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelScales
member.summary: Sets the VelScales setting for this . Use the velocity scaling parameters. Tune for standing still then use velocity scaling to make sure a running character stays balanced (the turning tends to make the character fall over more at speed).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper
member.summary: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetFallingReactionHelper for sending a SetFallingReaction to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetFallingReaction to.
member.remarks: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HandsAndKnees
member.summary: Sets the HandsAndKnees setting for this . set to true to get handsAndKnees catchFall if catchFall called. If true allows the dynBalancer to stay on during the catchfall and modifies the catch fall to give a more alive looking performance (hands and knees for front landing or sitting up for back landing).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.CallRDS
member.summary: Sets the CallRDS setting for this . If true catchFall will call rollDownstairs if comVel GT comVelRDSThresh - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall. Was previously only true for handsAndKnees.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ComVelRDSThresh
member.summary: Sets the ComVelRDSThresh setting for this . comVel above which rollDownstairs will start - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ResistRolling
member.summary: Sets the ResistRolling setting for this . For rds catchFall only: True to resist rolling motion (rolling motion is set off by ub contact and a sliding velocity), false to allow more of a continuous rolling (rolling motion is set off at a sliding velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ArmReduceSpeed
member.summary: Sets the ArmReduceSpeed setting for this . Strength is reduced in the catchFall when the arms contact the ground. 0.2 is good for handsAndKnees. 2.5 is good for normal catchFall, anything lower than 1.0 for normal catchFall may lead to bad catchFall poses.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ReachLengthMultiplier
member.summary: Sets the ReachLengthMultiplier setting for this . Reach length multiplier that scales characters arm topological length, value in range from (0, 1 GT where 1.0 means reach length is maximum.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.InhibitRollingTime
member.summary: Sets the InhibitRollingTime setting for this . Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can call rds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ChangeFrictionTime
member.summary: Sets the ChangeFrictionTime setting for this . Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can change the friction of parts to inhibit sliding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.GroundFriction
member.summary: Sets the GroundFriction setting for this . 8.0 was used on yanked) Friction multiplier on bodyParts when on ground. Character can look too slidy with groundFriction = 1. Higher values give a more jerky reation but this seems timestep dependent especially for dragged by the feet.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMin
member.summary: Sets the FrictionMin setting for this . Min Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMax
member.summary: Sets the FrictionMax setting for this . Max Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 9999.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopOnSlopes
member.summary: Sets the StopOnSlopes setting for this . Apply tactics to help stop on slopes.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopManual
member.summary: Sets the StopManual setting for this . Override slope value to manually force stopping on flat ground. Encourages character to come to rest face down or face up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StoppedStrengthDecay
member.summary: Sets the StoppedStrengthDecay setting for this . Speed at which strength reduces when stopped.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SpineLean1Offset
member.summary: Sets the SpineLean1Offset setting for this . Bias spine post towards hunched (away from arched).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.RiflePose
member.summary: Sets the RiflePose setting for this . Hold rifle in a safe position to reduce complications with collision. Only applied if holding a rifle.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HkHeadAvoid
member.summary: Sets the HkHeadAvoid setting for this . Enable head ground avoidance when handsAndKnees is true.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropClav
member.summary: Sets the AntiPropClav setting for this . Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by inhibiting backwards moving clavicles (keeps the arms slightly wider).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropWeak
member.summary: Sets the AntiPropWeak setting for this . Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by weakening the arms as soon they hit the floor. (Also stops the hands lifting up when flat on back).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HeadAsWeakAsArms
member.summary: Sets the HeadAsWeakAsArms setting for this . Head weakens as arms weaken. If false and antiPropWeak when falls onto back doesn't loosen neck so early (matches bodyStrength instead).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SuccessStrength
member.summary: Sets the SuccessStrength setting for this . When bodyStrength is less than successStrength send a success feedback - DO NOT GO OUTSIDE MIN/MAX PARAMETER VALUES OTHERWISE NO SUCCESS FEEDBACK WILL BE SENT.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper
member.summary: Sets viscosity applied to damping limbs.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper for sending a SetCharacterUnderwater to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetCharacterUnderwater to.
member.remarks: Sets viscosity applied to damping limbs.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Underwater
member.summary: Sets the Underwater setting for this . is character underwater?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Viscosity
member.summary: Sets the Viscosity setting for this . viscosity applied to character's parts.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.GravityFactor
member.summary: Sets the GravityFactor setting for this . gravity factor applied to character.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Stroke
member.summary: Sets the Stroke setting for this . swimming force applied to character as a function of handVelocity and footVelocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1000.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.LinearStroke
member.summary: Sets the LinearStroke setting for this . swimming force (linearStroke=true,False) = (f(v),f(v*v)).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper
member.summary: setCharacterCollisions:.

member.remarks: setCharacterCollisions:.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.Spin
member.summary: Sets the Spin setting for this . sliding friction turned into spin 80.0 (used in demo videos) good for rest of default params below. If 0.0 then no collision enhancement.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.MaxVelocity
member.summary: Sets the MaxVelocity setting for this . torque = spin*(relative velocity) up to this maximum for relative velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToAll
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToAll setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToSpine
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToSpine setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToThighs
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToThighs setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToClavicles
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToClavicles setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToUpperArms
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToUpperArms setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.FootSlip
member.summary: Sets the FootSlip setting for this . allow foot slipping if collided.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.VehicleClass
member.summary: Sets the VehicleClass setting for this . ClassType of the object against which to enhance the collision. All character vehicle interaction (e.g. braceForImpact glancing spins) relies on this value so EDIT WISELY. If it is used for things other than vehicles then NM should be informed.
member.remarks: Default value = 15. Min value = 0. Max value = 100.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper
member.summary: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.Core.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetCharacterDampingHelper for sending a SetCharacterDamping to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetCharacterDamping to.
member.remarks: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultThresh
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultThresh setting for this . Somersault AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 34.0. Falling over straight backwards gives 54 on hitting ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 34.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultDamp
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultDamp setting for this . Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around left/right axis) - try 0.45.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelThresh
member.summary: Sets the CartwheelThresh setting for this . Cartwheel AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 27.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 27.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelDamp
member.summary: Sets the CartwheelDamp setting for this . Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around front/back axis) - try 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.VehicleCollisionTime
member.summary: Sets the VehicleCollisionTime setting for this . Time after impact with a vehicle to apply characterDamping. -ve values mean always apply whether collided with vehicle or not. =0.0 never apply. =timestep apply for only that frame. A typical roll from being hit by a car lasts about 4secs.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.V2
member.summary: Sets the V2 setting for this . If true damping is proportional to Angular momentum squared. If false proportional to Angular momentum.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.remarks: Default value = 999999.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.SetFrictionScaleHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffness
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffness setting for this . muscleStiffness of masked joints. -values mean don't apply (just use defaults or ones applied by behaviours - safer if you are going to return to a behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . stiffness of masked joints. -ve values mean don't apply stiffness or damping (just use defaults or ones applied by behaviours). If you are using animpose fullbody on its own then this gives the opprtunity to use setStffness and setMuscleStiffness messages to set up the character's muscles. mmmmtodo get rid of this -ve.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.1f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.Core.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . damping of masked joints.

member.summary: Sets the ConnectedLeftHand setting for this . Is the left hand constrained to the world/ an object: -1=auto decide by impact info, 0=no, 1=part fully constrained (not implemented:, 2=part point constraint, 3=line constraint).
